content: this crochet pattern is very easy to follow and creates the most beautiful and easy lacy headband with a lovely feminine vibe it s super beginner friendly and can be made up in the space of just over an hour for this project you will need 1 skein of drops muskat or sirdar cotton dk or any other cotton yarn in dk/light 3 yarn 4 mm crochet hook basic hair elastic to sew onto project tapestry needle pair of scissors the full length video tutorial is linked in the pattern this pattern is written in us terms with british terms in brackets this is a great project for beginners pattern will be available for instant download upon payment happy crochet and thank you for stopping by
